key_elements: Use of technical and fundamental analysis frameworks

guidelines: Maintain an objective and balanced perspective
Use simple language where appropriate to explain complex ideas

framework.description: Compelling hook introducing the topic, aligned with market trends or evergreen relevance.
Detailed, data-backed insights using technical and fundamental frameworks.
Explain trading concepts or strategies with examples and actionable takeaways.
Include disclaimers, avoid specific trading advice, and align with regulatory requirements.
Summarize key points and reinforce the importance of risk management and informed decision-making.
